title: Blank Agent Template Schema
description: Configuration schema for the blank Bun agent template

AGENT_NAME.description: Agent name (set automatically from project directory name)

AGENT_VERSION.description: Semantic version number for the agent

PAYMENTS_FACILITATOR_URL.description: x402 facilitator endpoint URL for payment processing

PAYMENTS_RECEIVABLE_ADDRESS.description: Payment address - Ethereum (0x...) or Solana (Base58) format depending on network. Can be shared across multiple agents.

PRIVATE_KEY.description: Wallet private key for signing transactions (optional, can be added later)
